en.INTERNET_DISCONNECTED:
We're sorry, we can't seem to connect to the Jackbox Games servers.
Please check that your internet connection is working properly.
en.ROOM_DESTROYED:
We're sorry, a network error occurred and your room was destroyed.
Please check that your internet connection is working properly.
en.SOCKET_DISCONNECTED: We're sorry, we've lost your connection to the Jackbox Games servers.
en.TIMEOUT:
We're sorry, we can't seem to connect to the Jackbox Games servers.
Please check that your internet connection is working properly.
en.USER_DISCONNECT: We're sorry, the server has disconnected you. Please try again.
en.LOST_LICENSE: We're sorry, we lost the license for this content!
en.STEAM_ERROR: We're sorry, we couldn't validate your Steam license.
en.TWITCH_PRIME_ERROR: We're sorry, we couldn't validate your Twitch Prime license.
en.LOST_DLC: We're sorry, the license for your DLC could not be found. Returning you to the menu...
en.CONNECTING_DELAY:
Cela prend du temps...
Vérifiez votre connexion à internet.
en.JOIN_ON_YOUR_DEVICE: sur votre appareil mobile pour rejoindre
en.EVERYBODY_S_IN: Appuyez sur TOUT LE MONDE EST LÀ pour commencer !
en.FULL_SCREEN_DESCRIPTION: Mettez votre jeu en plein écran
en.VOLUME_SFX_DESCRIPTION: Ajuste le volume des effets sonores.
en.VOLUME_MUSIC_DESCRIPTION: Ajuste le volume de la musique.
en.FAMILY_FRIENDLY_DESCRIPTION: Activez pour désactiver les phrases les plus provocatrices du jeu. Cependant, nous ne pouvons pas contrôller les réponses des joueurs.
en.PASSWORDED_GAME_DESCRIPTION: Génère un mot de passe que les joueurs devront entrer pour entrer dans la partie.
en.AUDIENCE_MODE_DESCRIPTION: Turn on to allow non-players to join and affect the game.
en.TWITCH_REQUIRED_DESCRIPTION: Require players to be logged into Twitch.
en.MANUAL_CENSORING_DESCRIPTION: Allow the VIP (first player in) to censor players’ answers.
en.POSTGAME_SHARING_DESCRIPTION: Allow players to optionally share answers and scores from the game on social media.
en.START_GAMEPAD_DESCRIPTION: Games must be started with controller, not from player devices.
en.HIDE_ROOM_CODE_DESCRIPTION: Allow the on-screen room code to be hidden.
en.EXTENDED_TIMERS_DESCRIPTION: Enable very long timers. Recommended only for streamed games.
en.MAX_PLAYERS_DESCRIPTION: Number of players that can join the game.
